import React from 'react'; import {makeStyles} from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import footerAdornment from '../../assets/Footer Adornment.svg'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import Hidden from '@material-ui/core/Hidden'; const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ footer: { backgroundColor: theme.palette.common.blue, width: '100%', zIndex: 1302, position: 'relative' }, adornment: { width: '25em', verticalAlign: 'bottom', [theme.breakpoints.down("md")]: { width: '21em' }, [theme.breakpoints.down("xs")]: { width: '15em' } }, MainContainer: { position: 'absolute' }, link: { color: "white", fontFamily: 'Arial', fontSize: '0.75rem', fontWeight: 'bold', textDecoration: 'none' }, gridItem: { margin: "3em" } })); export default function Footer(props) { const classes = useStyles(); return (
props.setIsActive(0)} component={Link} to="/"> Home {props.setIsActive(1); props.setSelectedIndex(0);}} component={Link} to="/services"> Services {props.setIsActive(1); props.setSelectedIndex(1);}} component={Link} to="/customsoftware"> Custom Sofware Development {props.setIsActive(1); props.setSelectedIndex(2);}} component={Link} to="/mobileapps"> Mobile App Development {props.setIsActive(1); props.setSelectedIndex(3);}} component={Link} to="/websites"> Website Development props.setIsActive(2)} component={Link} to="/revolution"> The Revolution props.setIsActive(2)} component={Link} to="/vision"> Vision props.setIsActive(2)} component={Link} to="/technology"> Technology props.setIsActive(2)} component={Link} to="/process"> Process props.setIsActive(3)} component={Link} to="/about"> About Us props.setIsActive(3)} component={Link} to="/history"> History props.setIsActive(3)} component={Link} to="/team"> Team Member props.setIsActive(4)} component={Link} to="/contact"> Contact Us
); }
